DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether dipyridamole enhances postocclusive reactive hyperaemia by increasing extracellular adenosine concentrations during ischemia and reperfusion. Furthermore we hypothesize that dipyridamole augments postocclusive reactive hyperaemia by increasing adenosine receptor stimulation.
DOC.brief_title: Enhancement of Postocclusive Reactive Hyperaemia by Dipyridamole
DOC.criteria: healthy volunteers between 18 and 50 years none specified
